snippet: Gov. Dannel P. Malloy, who will give his second State of the State address on Wednesday, has won his big legislative initiatives so far, to the disappointment of critics.
abstract: Connecticut Gov Dannel P Malloy prepares for his first State of the State address, looking back on a year in which he made himself into something of a national figure by carving out a niche as a contrarian, unapologetic Democrat during an antigovernment, antitax wave.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Dannel P. Malloy, who will give his second State of the State address on Wednesday, has won his big legislative initiatives so far, to the disappointment of critics.

headline.seo: Malloy, Conn. Governor, Likes His First-Year Record
headline.main: Running Connecticut Like a Mayor, Not a King
headline.print_headline: Running Connecticut Like a Mayor, Not a King
